name: Lost in the Forest (itch) (IgorTheGameDeveloper)
description:
A boy and his sister come to visit their grandfather on a secluded island, but on the way to his house, they have to pass through a beautiful but dangerous forest. Things get complicated when the sister sees the rabbit and runs after it, thus separating herself from her brother. Your task is to help the boy find his sister.

https://liluo.io/igorthegamedeveloper/lostintheforest

Game made for GDevelop Game Jam #3 :)

Credits:

Bunny Sprite-Sheet by HRedBird (https://hredbird.itch.io/bunny-sprite-sheet) (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

wooden bridge by bleuteailfly (https://opengameart.org/content/wooden-bridge-1)
